prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is WHALE.
<ROUND i="1 of 15">
QUESTION: Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. Speak only when it helps.
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. Provide reasons for your action, keep it brief.
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","reasoning":<string>,"chat":<string|null>}
Do not add extra text before or after the JSON.
YOUR RESPONSE:

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is ELEPHANT.

Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.

You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is RABBIT.
<ROUND i="1 of 15">
You thought: First round. Experimenting with cooperation. I will contribute to see if others do.
CHAT:
- WHALE: Hi everyone, contributing 20 this round to see about cooperation.
- COW: Let's try to cooperate! I'm contributing 20 coins.
- ELEPHANT: Let's see how this goes! Starting with 0 contributed.
- OWL: Hi everyone! Contributing 20 to the pot this round, hoping for a good return.
- CHICK: Hi all, I'm CHICK. Contributing 20 to start!
- CROCODILE: Hello everyone, let's try cooperation!
- RABBIT (YOU): Hello everyone! I'll contribute this round to see how it goes.
- WALRUS: Let's cooperate and contribute!
- SNAKE: Let's try to cooperate and contribute!
- DUCK: Hey everyone, I'll contribute my 20 coins this round. Let's see what happens!
You thought: Many people are contributing, so I'll contribute as well to maximize the potential group payoff.

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS

The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
